医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示孤独会缩短老年人的健康寿命研究表明，孤独感会显着降低老年人（尤其是女性）的健康预期寿命，这凸显了采取有针对性的健康干预措施以改善福祉和健康的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Loneiness-slashes-healthy-years-in-older-adults-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Loneiness-slashes-healthy-years-in-older-adults-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6820e4e-e563-4c3d-ba2d-f4865ad64d6d Thu, 06 Jun 2024 22:25:00 -0400 Loneliness slashes healthy years in older adults, study reveals
肠道微生物群失衡与女性尿路感染风险较高有关研究表明，肠道微生物失调和频繁使用抗生素是女性复发性尿路感染 (UTI) 的关键危险因素，强调了健康的生活方式和膳食补充剂对预防尿路感染的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Gut-microbiota-imbalance-linked-to-higher-UTI-risks-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Gut-microbiota-imbalance-linked-to-higher-UTI-risks-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfcadcff-34d0-482b-9ffb-f9e66b0ca9be Thu, 06 Jun 2024 22:14:00 -0400 Gut microbiota imbalance linked to higher UTI risks in women
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：疗养院人员配置规则迅速遭到抵制毫不奇怪，疗养院行业正在提起诉讼，以阻止拜登政府的新规定，该规定要求接受联邦资金的设施配备最低限度的人员配置。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Nursing-home-staffing-rules-prompt-pushback.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Nursing-home-staffing-rules-prompt-pushback.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae1ccd65-8813-4109-a5db-210128d5c2f7 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 16:37:18 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Nursing home staffing rules prompt pushback
研究人员调查了新的家庭治疗暴食症的可行性伦敦国王学院精神病学、心理学和神经科学研究所 (IoPPN) 的研究人员研究了一种新的家庭治疗暴食症的可行性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Researchers-investigate-the-feasibility-of-new-home-administered-treatment-for-binge-eating-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Researchers-investigate-the-feasibility-of-new-home-administered-treatment-for-binge-eating-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1b1a480-2921-4337-9fd3-f34c4abb985f Thu, 06 Jun 2024 12:58:00 -0400 Researchers investigate the feasibility of new home-administered treatment for binge eating disorder
III 期试验凸显了调强质子治疗对口咽癌的益处根据德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心研究人员领导的一项多机构 III 期试验的初步数据，与传统的调强放射治疗相比，调强质子治疗 (IMPT) 取得了相似的临床结果，并为患者带来了显着的益处。 IMRT）作为口咽（头颈）癌患者放化疗的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Phase-III-tri-highlights-benefits-of-intensity-modulated-proton-therapy-for-oropharyngeal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Phase-III-tri-highlights-benefits-of-intensity-modulated-proton-therapy-for-oropharyngeal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=617f0dd2-883b-4aa3-b5f4-6ccf82762f5a Thu, 06 Jun 2024 12:48:33 -0400 Phase III trial highlights benefits of intensity modulated proton therapy for oropharyngeal cancer
抗菌脂肽可高效杀灭金黄色葡萄球菌由粘质沙雷氏菌产生的一种新型抗菌脂肽已被证明能够非常有效地杀死金黄色葡萄球菌——人类最重要的病原体之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Antibacterial-lipopeptide-shown-to-be-highly- effective-in-killing-Staphylococcus-aureus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Antibacterial-lipopeptide-shown-to-be-highly- effective-in-killing-Staphylococcus-aureus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f66980c-f513-438a-a84a-243470a0dcc6 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 12:39:52 -0400 Antibacterial lipopeptide shown to be highly effective in killing Staphylococcus aureus
新型 PET 放射性示踪剂可实现胃肠癌生物标志物的当天成像一种新型 PET 放射性示踪剂能够在当天对重要的胃肠癌生物标志物 Claudin18.2 (CLDN18.2) 进行成像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Novel-PET-radiotracer-enables-same-day-imaging-of-胃肠道-癌症-biomarker.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Novel-PET-radiotracer-enables-same-day-imaging-of-cancer-biomarker.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a437047a-8acb-4389-b5e2-3c6eedbbac45 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 12:29:16 -0400 Novel PET radiotracer enables same-day imaging of gastrointestinal cancer biomarker
白宫招募医生和医院打击枪支暴力白宫呼吁医院管理人员、医生和其他医疗保健领导者采取更大胆的措施，收集更多有关枪伤的数据，并定期向患者提供有关安全使用枪支的咨询，以防止枪支暴力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/White-House-enlists-doctors-and-hospitals-to-combat-gun-violence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/White-House-enlists-doctors-and-hospitals-to-combat-gun-violence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=327b31ee-9719-44a3-bc9d-0cf72b106ade Thu, 06 Jun 2024 12:07:02 -0400 White House enlists doctors and hospitals to combat gun violence
HEL 集团通过指定专业经销商扩大销售和支持HEL Group (HEL) 是一家用于流程优化、安全和放大的创新实验室工具的全球开发商和制造商，今天宣布扩大其全球销售网络，任命两家经销商：Paralab 和 ProAnalytics。新的特定应用分销商扩大了 HEL 的销售范围，并改善了欧洲和美国生物技术和化学合成客户获得技术和现场应用支持的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/HEL-Group-extends-sales-and-support-with-appointment-of-specialist-distributors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/HEL-Group-extends-sales-and-support-with-appointment-of-specialist-distributors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34b376e6-000e-4b24-ae73-9f98a54f8bb4 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 10:50:00 -0400 H.E.L Group extends sales and support with appointment of specialist distributors
超声技术突破血脑屏障治疗胶质母细胞瘤在治疗致命性脑癌胶质母细胞瘤的一项重大进展中，西北医学科学家使用超声波技术穿透血脑屏障并提供小剂量的化疗和免疫治疗药物混合物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Ultrasound-technology-breaks-blood-brain-barrier-for-glioblastoma-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Ultrasound-technology-breaks-blood-brain-barrier-for-glioblastoma-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad8e0f3f-77d7-4126-ab82-5ccea9c01030 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 10:38:39 -0400 Ultrasound technology breaks blood-brain barrier for glioblastoma treatment
